author: ovid11
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for an API that provides the consensus reward for each block. I've checked out the beaconcha.in API, but it only offers the execution/block API, which returns the MEV block reward. Does anyone know of an API that provides the consensus reward?

I would really appreciate your help with this. Thanks a lot!

author: jimmygchen
content:
The beacon node API `getBlockRewards` endpoint may be what you're looking for:
https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Rewards/getBlockRewards
